name: "The Free Project"
description:
A *very* old project created in march 2012. I think this was my first 'game'. 

It is a very weird and trippy project made in Unity3D. I have no idea what my old self wanted with this project.

Use the right mouse button to play this. Be warned because sometimes it is unclear what to do and how to play.

And sorry, it is only for windows! Back in the day I didn't think I would have to create a mac version..
